div.p: Find what you've been looking for in White County, Tennessee.

Whether you’re a company searching for a new location, a retiree looking for a safe, quiet community, an adventurer seeking fun, or a family in search of great schools and friendly people, you’ll find it easy to soar in White County, TN.

p.span: Spread Your Wings in White County.
p.br: Our optimal conditions for business, retirement, family life and recreation will help you reach new heights.

p.span: White County is Ready for You.
p.br: If you’re searching for a safe, beautiful and affordable community to retire in, look no further than White County.

span.span:
White County Government Services Continue
During COVID-19 RESPONSE

br.span:
While services continue to be provided, all county buildings will become limted access for public purposes until further notice. County employees are at work and can be reached by phone, internet, and mail during regular office hours. Visitors will be allowed in by appointment only.
The White County Clerk's Office will continue to offer services, without appointment, at a temporary walk-up window on the South side of the courthouse building during this time.

b.span: Click here for additional information, including contact information for the various offices.

span.span: Additional Resources form the Center for Disease Control and Prevention:

br.a: COVID-19: What You Need To Know
What To Do If You Are Sick With COVID-19

b.span: Click this link to request volunteer aid in response to the March 29th Storm in White County.

a.p: White County's forward thinking leaders are committed to community excellence.
We have the infrastructure and services in place to help your business.
Searching for something? Find it fast in our roundup of local resources.

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-2 views_slideshow_cycle_hidden views-row-even

a.p: A 6,700-foot asphalt runway and capacity for large jets offers corporate convenience.
Our industry-ready complex is just minutes from I-40 and Hwy. 111.

div.p: Enjoy charming shops, restaurants, arts and antiques in a hometown setting steeped in the flavor of days gone by.
From affordable real estate to low property taxes and access to state-of-the-art medical care, White County has what retirees are looking for.
Voting, getting married, going to court or paying taxes? Click here to find out where to do all of this and more.

There are so many things to do in White County. We have exciting events, rich history, gorgeous parks, restaurants ranging from down-home to gourmet, plenty of quaint shops and even an old-fashioned drive-in movie theater.

p.img: FIND WHAT YOU'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR IN WHITE COUNTY, TN.

div.p: Get the latest on White County happenings, find your way around and share us with your friends.

Sparta-White County has completed the five-step process required by the state to become a certified Tennessee Three-Star Community. The Three-Star Community program is designed to assist communities in achieving excellence in community and economic development.
For complete visitor information on Tennessee, call 1-800-G02-TENN or log on to tnvacation.com.

hr.p: ©Copyright White County Tennessee. Website by WDStone & Associates
